claims.claim: DBS has deployed over 1,500 AI models across 370 use cases projected to bring SGD 1 billion economic value by 2025
claims.quote: As of May 2025, DBS has deployed over 1,500 AI models across 370 use cases. These use cases are projected to bring the bank economic value of SGD 1 billion by 2025.

claims.claim: DBS reduced time-to-market for AI initiatives from 15 months to under 3 months through platform implementations
claims.quote: DBS' implementations of a data platform and protocol repository have reduced the time-to-market for AI initiatives from 15 months to just under three months.

claims.claim: Gen AI-powered CSO Assistant reduces call handling times and improves accuracy
claims.quote: Gen AI-powered tools like DBS' CSO Assistant can help customer service officers respond to queries more effectively. They do so by transcribing conversations in real-time, retrieving relevant information instantly, and assisting with documentation. The benefits include reduced call handling times and improved accuracy.

claims.claim: CSO Assistant achieves nearly 100% transcription accuracy and is expected to reduce call handling time by up to 20%
claims.quote: based on the data it collected during the pilot, it found that the tool has been able to achieve a transcription accuracy of nearly 100%. When fully deployed, it is expected to reduce call handling time by up to 20%.

claims.claim: Close to 90% of CSOs reported positive impact on workflow and expressed confidence in long-term use
claims.quote: Close to 90% of CSOs involved in the pilot reported that the virtual assistant had a positive impact on their workflow and expressed confidence in leveraging it in the longer term.

claims.claim: DBS AI Industrialisation Programme resulted in over S$370m of incremental economic benefits
claims.quote: DBS Bank's AI Industrialisation Programme has been instrumental in industrialising the use of data and AI across its business, resulting in over S$370m of incremental economic benefits.

claims.claim: DBS expects 20% decrease in average handling time per service request while maintaining near 100% accuracy
claims.quote: As a result, we are expecting to see a 20% decrease in average handling time per service request, freeing up our CSOs to focus on more complex, high-value work. Importantly, this efficiency gain hasn't come at the expense of quality — our solution maintains near 100% accuracy

claims.claim: DBS transformed over 240 experimental AI initiatives into more than 20 practical use cases
claims.quote: Under Panchmatia's guidance, DBS has successfully transformed over 240 experimental AI initiatives into more than 20 practical use cases.

claims.claim: CSO Assistant helps manage over 250,000 monthly customer queries more efficiently
claims.quote: Our Gen AI-enabled CSO Assistant, which will be progressively rolled out to our 500-strong customer service workforce in Singapore by end of the year, helps our customer service officers (CSOs) manage over 250,000 monthly customer queries more efficiently and effectively.
